this_title: Out of Tune: Lost in Rosario
introduction: AFTER HOURS meets LOST IN TRANSLATION with a dash of Waiting For Godot. Harry, an American actor travels down into South America; Rosario Argentina in search of some iconic filmmaker. Harry expects to be directed for the filmmaker's latest indie film. The director is nowhere to be found. This leads to mistaken identities, mixed up situations, characters and misunderstandings, which leads Harry deep into a Kafkaesque, no way-out kind of situations as he gets lost in Rosario.
chinese_title: Out of Tune: Lost in Rosario
